name: dark-aperture
description: A Piwigo theme based on Piwigo's Bootstrap Darkroom theme
author: Andrew Johnson, based on original work copyright Thomas Kuther

scripts.build: yarn build:bootstrap && yarn build:dark-aperture && yarn build:theme && yarn build:material && yarn build:bootswatch
scripts.build:bootstrap: node-sass --include-path node_modules --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/bootstrap-default.scss css/bootstrap-default/bootstrap.css && postcss --config postcss.config.js --replace css/bootstrap-default/bootstrap.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output css/bootstrap-default/bootstrap.min.css css/bootstrap-default/bootstrap.css
scripts.build:dark-aperture: node-sass --include-path node_modules --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/dark-aperture.scss css/dark-aperture/bootstrap.css && postcss --config postcss.config.js --replace css/dark-aperture/bootstrap.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output css/dark-aperture/bootstrap.min.css css/dark-aperture/bootstrap.css
scripts.build:theme: node-sass --include-path node_modules --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/theme.scss theme.css
scripts.build:material: for %i in (amber blue brown darkroom deep-orange deep-purple indigo light-green lime purple red teal) do (node-sass --include-path node_modules scss/material/_%i.scss css/material-%i/bootstrap.css && postcss --config postcss.config.js --replace css/material-%i/bootstrap.css && cleancss --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output css/material-%i/bootstrap.min.css css/material-%i/bootstrap.css)
scripts.build:bootswatch: for %i in (cerulean cosmo cyborg darkly flatly journal litera lumen lux materia minty pulse sandstone simplex sketchy slate solar spacelab superhero united yeti) do (node-sass --include-path node_modules scss/bootswatch/_%i.scss css/bootswatch-%i/bootstrap.css && postcss --config postcss.config.js --replace css/bootswatch-%i/bootstrap.css && cleancss --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output css/bootswatch-%i/bootstrap.min.css css/bootswatch-%i/bootstrap.css)
scripts.build:custom: node-sass --include-path node_modules --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/custom/custom.scss css/custom/bootstrap.css && postcss --config postcss.config.js --replace css/custom/bootstrap.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output css/custom/bootstrap.min.css css/custom/bootstrap.css
